name: Check if Admin able to update a program with invalid program Name and request body

steps.name: Given  Admin creates PUT Request for the LMS API endpoint with valid request body with mandatory, additional fields.
When  Admin sends HTTPS request with invalid endpoint to update a program with invalid program Name
Then  Admin gets 404 Not Found Status with message and boolean success details
